info.title: SqlManagementClient
info.description: The Azure SQL Database management API provides a RESTful set of web APIs that interact with Azure SQL Database services to manage your databases. The API enables users to create, retrieve, update, and delete databases, servers, and other entities.

get.description: Lists all executions in a job agent.

parameters.name: jobAgentName
parameters.description: The name of the job agent.

parameters.name: createTimeMin
parameters.description: If specified, only job executions created at or after the specified time are included.

parameters.name: createTimeMax
parameters.description: If specified, only job executions created before the specified time are included.

parameters.name: endTimeMin
parameters.description: If specified, only job executions completed at or after the specified time are included.

parameters.name: endTimeMax
parameters.description: If specified, only job executions completed before the specified time are included.

parameters.name: isActive
parameters.description: If specified, only active or only completed job executions are included.

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: The number of elements in the collection to skip.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: The number of elements to return from the collection.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 404 JobAgentNotFound - Specified job agent does not exist in the specified logical server.

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveServer - The requested server was not found

 * 404 ServerNotInSubscriptionResourceGroup - Specified server does not exist in the specified resource group and subscription.

post.description: Requests cancellation of a job execution.

parameters.name: jobAgentName
parameters.description: The name of the job agent.

parameters.name: jobName
parameters.description: The name of the job.

parameters.name: jobExecutionId
parameters.description: The id of the job execution to cancel.

200.description: Successfully requested cancellation of the job execution.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 400 ElasticJobsOperationFailed - Elastic jobs management operation failed.

 * 400 ElasticJobsOperationFailed - Elastic jobs management operation failed.

 * 404 JobAgentNotFound - Specified job agent does not exist in the specified logical server.

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveServer - The requested server was not found

 * 404 ServerNotInSubscriptionResourceGroup - Specified server does not exist in the specified resource group and subscription.

 * 404 ResourceNotFound - The requested resource was not found.

parameters.name: jobAgentName
parameters.description: The name of the job agent.

parameters.name: jobName
parameters.description: The name of the job to get.

200.description: Successfully started an execution for the job.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 400 ElasticJobsOperationFailed - Elastic jobs management operation failed.

 * 400 ElasticJobsOperationFailed - Elastic jobs management operation failed.

 * 404 JobAgentNotFound - Specified job agent does not exist in the specified logical server.

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveServer - The requested server was not found

 * 404 ServerNotInSubscriptionResourceGroup - Specified server does not exist in the specified resource group and subscription.

 * 404 ResourceNotFound - The requested resource was not found.

*** Error Responses: ***

 * 404 JobAgentNotFound - Specified job agent does not exist in the specified logical server.

 * 404 ResourceNotFound - The requested resource was not found.

 * 404 ServerNotInSubscriptionResourceGroup - Specified server does not exist in the specified resource group and subscription.

parameters.description: The name of the job agent.

parameters.name: jobName
parameters.description: The name of the job.

parameters.name: jobExecutionId
parameters.description: The id of the job execution

put.description: Creates or updates a job execution.

parameters.name: jobAgentName
parameters.description: The name of the job agent.

parameters.name: jobName
parameters.description: The name of the job to get.

parameters.name: jobExecutionId
parameters.description: The job execution id to create the job execution under.

200.description: A job execution for the job with the given id already existed.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 400 ElasticJobsOperationFailed - Elastic jobs management operation failed.

 * 400 ElasticJobsOperationFailed - Elastic jobs management operation failed.

 * 404 JobAgentNotFound - Specified job agent does not exist in the specified logical server.

 * 404 ResourceNotFound - The requested resource was not found.

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveServer - The requested server was not found

 * 404 ServerNotInSubscriptionResourceGroup - Specified server does not exist in the specified resource group and subscription.

201.description: Successfully started an execution for the job.

nextLink.description: Link to retrieve next page of results.

JobExecutionProperties.description: Properties for an Azure SQL Database Elastic job execution.

jobExecutionId.description: The unique identifier of the job execution.

lifecycle.description: The detailed state of the job execution.

provisioningState.description: The ARM provisioning state of the job execution.

createTime.description: The time that the job execution was created.

startTime.description: The time that the job execution started.

endTime.description: The time that the job execution completed.

currentAttempts.description: Number of times the job execution has been attempted.

currentAttemptStartTime.description: Start time of the current attempt.

lastMessage.description: The last status or error message.

target.description: The target that this execution is executed on.

JobExecutionTarget.description: The target that a job execution is executed on.
